typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		current_flag as string,
		npi as string,
		data_month as integer,
		{active flag} as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{replacement npi} as string,
		{employer identification number (ein)} as string,
		{provider organization name (legal business name)} as string,
		{provider last name (legal name)} as string,
		{provider first name} as string,
		{provider middle name} as string,
		{provider name prefix text} as string,
		{provider name suffix text} as string,
		{provider credential text} as string,
		{provider other organization name} as string,
		{provider other organization name type code} as string,
		{provider other last name} as string,
		{provider other first name} as string,
		{provider other middle name} as string,
		{provider other name prefix text} as string,
		{provider other name suffix text} as string,
		{provider other credential text} as string,
		{provider other last name type code} as string,
		{provider first line business mailing address} as string,
		{provider second line business mailing address} as string,
		{provider business mailing address city name} as string,
		{provider business mailing address state name} as string,
		{provider business mailing address postal code} as string,
		{provider business mailing address country code (if outside u.s.) } as string,
		{provider business mailing address telephone number} as string,
		{provider business mailing address fax number} as string,
		{provider first line business practice location address} as string,
		{provider second line business practice location address} as string,
		{provider business practice location address city name} as string,
		{provider business practice location address state name} as string,
		{provider business practice location address postal code} as string,
		{provider business practice location address country code out us} as string,
		{provider business practice location address telephone number} as string,
		{provider business practice location address fax number} as string,
		{provider enumeration date} as date,
		{last update date} as date,
		{npi deactivation reason code} as string,
		{npi deactivation date} as date,
		{npi reactivation date} as date,
		{provider gender code} as string,
		{authorized official last name} as string,
		{authorized official first name} as string,
		{authorized official middle name} as string,
		{authorized official title or position} as string,
		{authorized official telephone number} as string,
		{is sole proprietor} as string,
		{is organization subpart} as string,
		{parent organization lbn} as string,
		{parent organization tin} as string,
		{authorized official name prefix text} as string,
		{authorized official name suffix text} as string,
		{authorized official credential text} as string,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy code} as string,
		{healthcare provider primary group taxonomy} as string,
		{provider primary license number} as string,
		{provider primary license number state code} as string,
		primary_taxonomy_grouping as string,
		primary_taxonomy_classification as string,
		primary_taxonomy_specialization as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StCmsNppesMain
source(output(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		other_provider_identifier as string,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code as string,
		other_provider_identifier_state as string,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProdCmsNppesOtherProviderID
source(output(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		{other provider identifier} as string,
		{other provider identifier state} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StCMSNPPESOtherProvID
ProdCmsNppesOtherProviderID filter(current_flag=='1') ~> ProdNPPESOtherProvIDCurrent
StCmsNppesMain filter({active flag}=='1') ~> StNPPESMainActive
StNPPESMainActive aggregate(groupBy(npi),
	temp = count(npi)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in([('npi')],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StNPPESMainActiveNPI
StCMSNPPESOtherProvIDFixColumnName aggregate(groupBy(npi),
	temp = count(npi)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		temp_npi = npi
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Select2 join(temp_npi == npi_prod,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
ProdNPPESOtherProvIDCurrent aggregate(groupBy(npi),
	temp = count(npi)) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3 select(mapColumn(
		npi_prod = npi
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 split(isNull(npi_prod),
	temp_npi==npi_prod,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewNPI, InBoth, OldNPI)
Select3, StCMSNPPESOtherProvIDFixColumnName lookup(temp_npi == npi,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup
ConditionalSplit1@NewNPI select(mapColumn(
		temp_npi
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
ConditionalSplit1@InBoth select(mapColumn(
		temp_npi
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
ConditionalSplit1@OldNPI select(mapColumn(
		temp_npi = npi_prod
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Lookup select(mapColumn(
		npi = temp_npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewNPIProviderOtherIDFinal
Select4, StCMSNPPESOtherProvIDFixColumnName lookup(temp_npi == npi,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InBothStOtherProvID
Select4, ProdNPPESOtherProvIDCurrent lookup(temp_npi == npi,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InBothProdOtherProvID
StCMSNPPESOtherProvID select(mapColumn(
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier = {other provider identifier},
		other_provider_identifier_issuer = {other provider identifier issuer},
		other_provider_identifier_state = {other provider identifier state},
		other_provider_identifier_type_code = {other provider identifier type code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StCMSNPPESOtherProvIDFixColumnName
Select8, DerivedColumn2 exists(Compare_key_StOther == Compare_key_ProdOther,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NPIInBothNewData
NPIInBothNewData select(mapColumn(
		npi = temp_npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NPIInBothNewDataFinal
DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn3 exists(Compare_key_ProdOther == Compare_key_StOther,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NPIInBothOldData
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NPIInBothOldDataFinal
NPIInBothOldData derive(current_flag = '0') ~> DerivedColumn1
Select5, StNPPESMainActiveNPI exists(temp_npi == npi,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, StCMSNPPESOtherProvIDFixColumnName lookup(temp_npi == npi,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter({active flag}=='1') ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive({active flag} = '0') ~> SetOldDataToActiveFlag0
Filter1 derive(current_flag = '0') ~> SetOldDataToCurrentFlag0
SetOldDataToActiveFlag0 select(mapColumn(
		npi = temp_npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NPIOldDataActiveFlag0Final
SetOldDataToCurrentFlag0 select(mapColumn(
		npi = temp_npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NPIOldDataCurrentFlag0Final
NewNPIProviderOtherIDFinal, NPIInBothNewDataFinal, NPIInBothOldDataFinal, NPIOldDataActiveFlag0Final, NPIOldDataCurrentFlag0Final union(byName: true)~> NewChangeDataFinal
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='current_flag'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
DerivedColumn4, Select6 exists(Prod_Compare_Key == OldData_CompareKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> KeepOldDataFinal
Select9, NewChangeDataFinal union(byName: true)~> FinalData
InBothProdOtherProvID select(mapColumn(
		npi = temp_npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		temp_npi,
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code,
		Compare_key_StOther
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select8
Select7 derive(Compare_key_ProdOther = upper(concat(npi,iifNull({entity type code},''),iifNull({active flag},''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_type_code,''),
iifNull(other_provider_identifier_state,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_issuer,'')))) ~> DerivedColumn2
InBothStOtherProvID derive(Compare_key_StOther = upper(concat(npi,iifNull({entity type code},''),iifNull({active flag},''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_type_code,''),
iifNull(other_provider_identifier_state,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_issuer,'')))) ~> DerivedColumn3
ProdCmsNppesOtherProviderID derive(Prod_Compare_Key = upper(concat(npi,iifNull(data_month,''),iifNull({entity type code},''),iifNull({active flag},''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_type_code,''),
iifNull(other_provider_identifier_state,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_issuer,'')))) ~> DerivedColumn4
NewChangeDataFinal derive(OldData_CompareKey = upper(concat(npi,iifNull(data_month,''),iifNull({entity type code},''),iifNull({active flag},''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_type_code,''), iifNull(other_provider_identifier_state,''),iifNull(other_provider_identifier_issuer,'')))) ~> DerivedColumn5
KeepOldDataFinal select(mapColumn(
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		other_provider_identifier,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code,
		other_provider_identifier_state,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select9
FinalData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		other_provider_identifier as string,
		other_provider_identifier_type_code as string,
		other_provider_identifier_state as string,
		other_provider_identifier_issuer as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
